channel.title: Post Falls|Kootenai County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: ID-41 South at I-90 - Interstate Trucks
item.description: ID-41 south approaching I-90. All Interstate trucks must be weighed at Port of Entry on I-90 East.

item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 7 - ID-41/Rathdrum/Spirit Lake.

item.title: I-90 East - Post Falls Exits
item.description: Post Falls exits on I-90 east - Spokane St. and Jct. ID-41.

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 2
item.description: I-90 west approaching Exit 2 - Pleasant View Road. This is the last Idaho exit on I-90.

item.description: Post Falls exits on I-90 west. Next three exits: Seltice Way, Spokane St., and Pleasant View Road.

item.title: I-90 West - Exits 7 and 6
item.description: I-90 west at Exit 7 - ID-41/Rathdrum/Spirit Lake. Approaching Exit 6 - BL-90/Seltice Way/City Center.

item.title: I-90 East Exit 2
item.description: I-90 East at Exit 2 - Pleasant View Road. This is the first exit in Idaho on I-90 East.
